snippet: Pio Pico State Historic Park, where the last governor of Mexico’s Alta California once lived, is one of 70 parks scheduled to be closed this summer.
abstract: Whittier Journal; California's Pio Pico State Historic Park, where the last governor of Mexico's Alta California once lived, is one of 70 parks scheduled to be closed in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Pio Pico State Historic Park, where the last governor of Mexico’s Alta California once lived, is one of 70 parks scheduled to be closed this summer.

headline.seo: California’s Pio Pico State Historic Park May Close
headline.main: California May Close a Home to Its Past
